## JsonReferenceMap interface

Interface for a simple map that returns named

**Signature:**

```typescript
export interface IJsonReferenceMap 
```

## Methods

|  Method | Description |
|  --- | --- |
|  [getJsonObject(key, context)](./ts-json.jsonreferencemap.getjsonobject.md) | Gets a JSON object specified by key. |
|  [getJsonValue(key, context)](./ts-json.jsonreferencemap.getjsonvalue.md) | Gets a JSON value specified by key. |
|  [has(key)](./ts-json.jsonreferencemap.has.md) | Determines if an object with the specified key actually exists in the map. |
|  [keyIsInRange(key)](./ts-json.jsonreferencemap.keyisinrange.md) | Determine if a key might be valid for this map but does not determine if key actually exists. Allows key range to be constrained. |
